title: Healthy Home Meals
subtitle: Take a picture of your refrigerator contents or the ingredients available and discover tons of healthy recipes that you can make at home.

title: College Freshers Portal
subtitle: A portal for freshers to learn about their own batchmates, seniors, societies and access shared resources like notes, questions, and slides.

title: Advaita Fest 2k23
subtitle: Official site for Advaita: the annual techno-cultural fest of IIIT Bhubaneswar built for participants, sponsors, and organizers alike.

title: ClashVerse Discord Bot
subtitle: A discord bot for Clash of Clans to get stats, zapquake combos, trader items, and more with in-game-like image-based responses.

title: Coding Contests Companion
subtitle: Discord bot for contests info, notifications, and daily problems from codechef, leetcode, hackerrank, codeforces, atcoder, and more!

title: Personal Finance Tracker
subtitle: Web app built with help of Copilot which helps users keep track of their budget and expenses with support for cloud and local backups.

title: Mess Management System
subtitle: Mess portal where students can buy their desired coupons, with a QR code system and Razorpay integration. Includes admin panel for owners.

title: ZapQuake Combos
subtitle: Tool to find the minimum spell combinations including higher-level cc spells required to take down any level defense in Clash of Clans.

title: Search your Weather
subtitle: Web app to find the find the detailed weather conditions of any place in the world built using weather services in Azure maps API.

title: Visits Counter
subtitle: URL query based customizable SVG visits counter badge for github markdown files and sites, with web tool for easy customizations.

title: IIIT-Bh MUMS Mailer
subtitle: Emails new notices from IIIT-Bh university management system into student group email addresses for notifications.

title: Tours and Travels Portal
subtitle: Website for a car rental company with cars showcase, gallery, services, testimonials, and an admin dashboard.

title: 8D Slow Reverbed
subtitle: Python script to generate the 8D + Slow + Reverb effect version of any song using its WAV or MP3 file with FFMPEG.

title: Link Shortener
subtitle: Free to use link shortener with custom short link suffixes, delete link feature, and extensive visitor count tracking.

title: Disaster Rapid Response
subtitle: Provides disaster heatmaps by analyzing aerial imaging for relief, and blockchain based financial aid transfer based on damage.
